hero.headline: About
hero.description: We're building the infrastructure for digital equity. Founded in 2019, TrueLeap is on a mission to connect the 3.7 billion people who lack reliable internet access to the global digital economy.

story.headline: Born from a simple observation
paragraphs: In 2018, our founders were working on digital identity systems for a government in East Africa. They kept running into the same problem: their cloud-based solutions failed the moment users left urban areas.
The realization was clear: you can't build digital services for people who don't have reliable connectivity. The cloud-first approach that works in San Francisco doesn't work in rural Rwanda.
So they built something different. A complete technology stack designed from the ground up for low-connectivity environments. Solar-powered. Offline-first. Locally owned.

quote.text: Geography should not determine destiny. Every person deserves access to the tools and opportunities of the digital age.
quote.name: Amara Okonkwo
